channel.title: A blog by Yosua Ian Sebastian
channel.description: Recent content on A blog by Yosua Ian Sebastian

item.title: Focusing Is Hard For Current Me
item.description: These days, I can not focus on one thing for extended amount of time.

item.title: Monitor Notes
item.description: A diary of boring adventure in setting up monitors. Also works as a timecapsule letter, dear future me, don’t repeat these mistakes.

item.title: Device List
item.description: List of devices that I use, mainly to make sure I don’t forget that I (used to) own these things.

item.title: Buyee or Geek Jack?
item.description: My personal experiences from buying VTuber goods through Buyee and Geek Jack.

item.title: Playlist
item.description: A place where I would list some music that I really liked. Might skip over some tracks from an album. One day I will stand up my own Funkwhale instance, one day! Hoshimachi Suisei (星街すいせい)⌗ Note: As far as I know, Suisei hasn't released any physical CDs for sale. No Track Album Date Price (JPY) Link 1 comet - 2018-11-22 ¥0 YOUTU.BE 2 天球、彗星は夜を跨いで - 2019-03-22 ¥0 YOUTU.BE 3 NEXT COLOR PLANET - 2020-03-22 ¥255 MUSIC.

item.title: Where's My index.html?
item.description: How I learned about git submodules behavior when trying to deploy this site.

item.title: About
item.description: Hi there, my name is Yosua Ian Sebastian. Currently I’m working as a software engineer to pay the bills and put food on the table for my parents. Any writings on this site is my personal opinion and does not represent the view of my employer yada yada. Initially I started this blog to practice writing, but it’s not going really well. This blog will probably end up as a daily life ramblings and (maybe) technical posts.
